org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.ui
Class ActionComponent

java.lang.Object
  org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.ui.ActionComponent
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionDialog, ActionPageListWizard, CredentialContextComp, CredentialMappingTaskComp, DefaultConfigComp, DefaultEditComp, DefaultHelpComp, DefaultViewComp, FileComp, JobComponent, ResourceComponent, ResourceRegistryComp
public abstract class ActionComponent
extends java.lang.Object

Action components implement an event / component based model for developing portlets.
